analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/16/0xa759b460eb16d15b7e1f2623c638523d8a43cbd1.sol#257-258) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/16/0xa759b460eb16d15b7e1f2623c638523d8a43cbd1.sol#273-278)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/16/0xa759b460eb16d15b7e1f2623c638523d8a43cbd1.sol#286-294)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/16/0xa759b460eb16d15b7e1f2623c638523d8a43cbd1.sol#298-306)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/16/0xa759b460eb16d15b7e1f2623c638523d8a43cbd1.sol#310-317)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/16/0xa759b460eb16d15b7e1f2623c638523d8a43cbd1.sol#559-569) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/16/0xa759b460eb16d15b7e1f2623c638523d8a43cbd1.sol#564-565)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/16/0xa759b460eb16d15b7e1f2623c638523d8a43cbd1.sol#579-586) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/16/0xa759b460eb16d15b7e1f2623c638523d8a43cbd1.sol#583-585)
